title.value: Межсортовая гибридизация в селекции гороха овощного и фасоли
Intervarietal hybridization in selection of field pea and bean
Intervarietal hybridization in selection of field pea and bean

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Maksimenya, E.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing
Skorina, V.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data selection work on creation of constant hybrids and highly productive grades of bean crops: field pea (Pisum arvense L.) and common bean (Phaseolus vulgaris). By means of the intervarietal hybridization method there were developed varieties of vegetable pea Gorynets, ROS-1, Arfey; vegetable bean Zinulya, Ira and Athena. Among them Gorynets and ROS-1 and the above mentioned varieties of beans were adapted for soil and climatic conditions of the republic, and pea variety Arfey is passing the state test. In the process of the competitive test are 8 selection samples of peas and 8 samples of beans.
